description: There`s nothing strange about the love between a man a woman - except perhaps when that woman is a Humaritt! As the unique couple that is Yoshiki and Serina go on the run, Najica and Lila are sent to help them to safety. But as the duo fight off pursuing Humaritt squadrons, they begin to suspect that the deadliest Humaritt of the lot might already be among them. For behind Serina`s innocent and vulnerable facade lurks a deadly and dangerous warrior - one who will stop at nothing to protect her husband.

titles.title: Im Kampf ist die Liebe die größte Herausforderung
Tatakai no Shuuchakueki wa Kiken na Ai to Tomo ni
The Terminal Station of the Fight Appears with Dangerous Love
闘いの終着駅は危険な愛と共に
